item.title: 泰克交易后，嘉能可将就煤炭分拆上市咨询投资者
item.description: 一旦收购泰克资源有限公司煤矿的交易于今年晚些时候结束，Glencore Plc 将开始就其煤炭业务的未来与股东进行磋商。【原文：Glencore Plc will start consulting with shareholders on the future of its coal business as soon as its deal to buy Teck Resources Ltd.’s mines closes later this year.】

item.title: 德国通胀再次走高，凸显欧洲央行面临的挑战
item.description: 德国通胀率连续第二个月上升--这凸显了欧洲中央银行在准备下周降息的同时，为实现其 2% 的目标所面临的任务。【原文：German inflation quickened for a second month – underscoring the task for the European Central Bank to achieve its 2% target as it prepares to lower interest rates next week.】

item.title: 雪佛龙在通往赫斯收购— 和圭亚那石油公司的漫长道路上不断前进
item.description:
获得赫斯股东的批准是一场胜利，但还有更多障碍等待着我们。【原文：

Approval from Hess shareholders was a win, but more hurdles await.

】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率一个月来首次上升，抑制了需求
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率一个月来首次上调，抑制了购房和再融资需求。【原文：US mortgage rates increased for the first time in a month, denting demand for home-buying and refinancing.】

item.title: 纽约市立小学院将与东北大学合并
item.description: 曼哈顿上东区的一所小型私立学院正在与东北大学合并，高等教育的残酷经济学正在上演。【原文：A small, private college on Manhattan’s Upper East Side is merging with Northeastern University, as the brutal economics of higher education unfold.】

item.title: 欧洲债券销售额将创纪录地突破 1 万亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲今年的债券发行量将突破 1 万亿欧元（1.1 万亿美元）大关，比此前创下的纪录提前了一个多星期。【原文：European bond issuance this year is set to hit the €1 trillion ($1.1 trillion) mark more than a week before a previous record.】

item.title: 越南电力公司在需求创纪录的情况下寻求更多电力节约
item.description: 越南国营电力公司表示，尽管预计今年不会出现电力短缺，但该公司呼吁家庭、办公室和工厂减少用电量。【原文：Vietnam’s state-run utility is calling on households, offices and factories to reduce electricity usage though it does not foresee power shortages this year, the company said.】

item.title: 对冲基金重回可转债交易，但过去却充满争议
item.description: 一种可以在到期时转换成股票的债券发行量激增，这有助于重振在金融危机期间被击垮的对冲基金策略。【原文：A surge in issuance of a type of bond that can convert into stock on maturity is helping revive a hedge fund strategy that was crushed during the financial crisis.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。由于降息预期减弱，债券收益率飙升，全球股市下滑，美股也准备跟进。必和必拓（BHP）竞购矿业巨头英美资源集团（Anglo American）的风波似乎暂时告一段落，而另一项石油交易可能就在眼前。以下是市场动向— Morwenna Coniam【原文：Good morning. Stocks are sliding globally, with US shares poised to follow, as bond yields spike on fading rate cut expectations. BHP’s bidding saga for miner Anglo American seems likely to be over for now, while another oil deal may be in sight. Here’s what’s moving markets — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: Gol 母公司与 Azul 就可能的交易展开谈判
item.description: Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 的控股股东已开始与 Azul SA 谈判。【原文：The controlling shareholder of Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA has started talks with Azul SA.】

item.title: 高盛为其最大的私人信贷池筹集资金 210 亿美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has put together $21 billion for private credit wagers, its biggest war chest yet for Wall Street’s buzziest asset class.】

item.title: 欧盟力争在 6 月底前启动乌克兰加入欧盟谈判
item.description: 欧盟的目标是最早于 6 月 25 日与乌克兰就加入欧盟展开谈判，以帮助提高基辅的士气，但尚未完全克服匈牙利的反对意见。【原文：The European Union is aiming to start negotiations as early as June 25 with Ukraine on becoming a member of the bloc to help boost Kyiv’s morale, but has yet to fully overcome objections from Hungary.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行盈利不及预期，准备金高于预期
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行未能达到分析师的预期，该行为潜在的信贷损失预留了比预期更多的资金，因为消费者和企业都在与更高的利率作斗争。【原文：Bank of Montreal missed analysts’ estimates after setting aside more money than expected for potential credit losses as consumers and businesses struggle with higher interest rates.】

item.title: 警方在调查 "干预俄罗斯 "事件中搜查欧盟议会办公室
item.description: 比利时调查人员周三上午在布鲁塞尔欧洲议会就俄罗斯可能进行的干预进行了搜查。【原文：Belgian investigators conducted searches at the European Parliament in Brussels on Wednesday morning over potential Russian interference.】

item.title: 大选前墨西哥投资者在关注什么？
item.description: 投资者认为墨西哥总统选举已成定局，但真正可能导致市场波动的因素却潜伏在选票的其他地方。【原文：Investors see Mexico’s presidential election as a foregone conclusion, but the real possibilities for market volatility are lurking elsewhere on the ballot.】

item.title: 津巴布韦的新货币 ZiG 带来了通货紧缩
item.description: 津巴布韦已成为通胀失控的代名词，但在采用新货币后，该国目前正在与通货紧缩作斗争。【原文：Zimbabwe, which has become synonymous with runaway inflation, is now contending with deflation following the introduction of its new currency.】

item.title: 卡扎克表示，欧洲央行不应 "自动驾驶 "降息
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）认为，欧洲央行不应在下周首次降息后转为 "自动驾驶"。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t switch to “autopilot” in cutting interest rates following an expected first move next week, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团不愿延长必和必拓的最后期限，收购要约恐将终止
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）表示，不会再给必和必拓集团更多时间承诺收购要约，这标志着这家全球最大矿业公司以 490 亿美元收购必和必拓的计划可能暂时告一段落。【原文：Anglo American Plc said it won’t give BHP Group any further time to commit to a takeover offer, signalling the likely end for now to a $49 billion pursuit by the world’s biggest mining company.】

item.title: 德国工人年初加薪幅度创历史新高
item.description: 考虑到通货膨胀因素，德国工人在第一季度的加薪幅度创历史新高。【原文：German workers received a record pay increase in the first quarter — when taking inflation into account.】

item.title: 英伟达飙升，对冲基金对 "华丽七侠 "的投资创历史新高
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds’ exposure to US technology behemoths hit a record high following Nvidia Corp.’s estimate-thumping earnings report last week, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s prime brokerage.】

item.title: 英镑兑欧元升至 2022 年 8 月以来最强劲水平
item.description: 英镑兑欧元升至近两年来的最强水平，因为人们越来越多地预期英格兰银行将在降息方面落后于欧洲中央银行。【原文：The pound rose to the strongest level against the euro in almost two years as the Bank of England is increasingly expected to trail the European Central Bank in lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 印度在投票结束前几天赢得 S&P 评级展望上调
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）表示，印度的主权信用评级可能在未来几个月内上调，这给距离大选结果公布不到一周的印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政府注入了一针强心剂。【原文：S&P Global Ratings signaled a likely upgrade in India’s sovereign credit rating in coming months, giving a boost to Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government less than a week before election results are released.】

item.title: 我们是否完全用错了去碳化的方法？
item.description:
可再生能源在增长，但化石燃料也在增长。【原文：

Renewables are growing, but so are fossil fuels.

】

item.title: 外国人将印度衍生品持有量提升至创纪录的 1010 亿美元
item.description: 在印度大选结束前几天，全球投资者持有的印度股票衍生品已升至创纪录水平，因为有迹象表明，他们对可能出现的结果越来越有信心。【原文：Global investors’ holdings of equity derivatives in India have risen to a record days before the nation’s elections end, as signs emerge that they’re growing more confident about the likely outcome.】

item.title: 阿联酋与韩国签署旨在促进双边贸易的协定
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国与韩国达成了一项加强双边贸易的协议，使这个亚洲第四大经济体加入到与这个富裕的海湾国家达成贸易协议的国家名单中。【原文：The United Arab Emirates reached an agreement with South Korea to bolster bilateral commerce, adding Asia’s fourth-largest economy to a growing roster of nations to close trade deals with the wealthy Gulf state.】

item.title: 米兰法院就意大利救援条件对帕斯基蒙特银行进行调查
item.description: 米兰一家法院对 Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 展开了新一轮调查，以核实该银行在接受国家救援时的账目是否公正地反映了其财务状况。【原文：A Milan court has opened a new probe into Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA to verify whether the lender’s accounts at the time of a state rescue fairly represented its financial situation.】

item.title: 摩根大通即将纳入印度债券市场，外国基金重返印度债券市场
item.description: 随着印度即将被纳入摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Foreign investors are returning to rupee-denominated bonds as India’s inclusion in JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s emerging-market debt index approaches.】

item.title: 被遗忘的中英股票互联互通项目需要重启
item.description: 多年来，伦敦证券交易所一直在宣传与中国股票市场挂钩的举措，认为这将使全球投资者能够通过英国了解这个亚洲国家的经济增长。然而，自该机制推出近五年以来，它已从人们的视线中消失。【原文：For years, the London Stock Exchange touted a link with China’s equity markets as an initiative that would give global investors access to the Asian nation’s growth through the UK. Yet almost five years since the mechanism was introduced, it has dropped off the radar.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，康菲石油公司正在谈判收购马拉松石油公司
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）正在就收购规模较小的竞争对手马拉松石油公司（Marathon Oil Corp.【原文：ConocoPhillips is in advanced talks to acquire smaller rival Marathon Oil Corp. to extend the industry’s spree of deal-making, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 南非大选投票在即，兰特岌岌可危
item.description: 兰特将是周三南非大选期间为数不多的交易资产之一，因为投资者的乐观情绪推动了兰特连续五周的上涨，但同时也让位于对大选意外结果风险的谨慎。【原文：The rand will be one of the few South African assets trading through the country’s general election Wednesday, as investor optimism that drove a five-week rally gives way to caution over the risk of a surprise outcome.】
